channel.title: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute (CX-022)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: Informs of relocation of NRR to Rockville,MD.Official mailing address still remains same & project managers have new locations & phone numbers.TS Michaels still lead project manager for facility & A Adams will serve as backup.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, NRC TO PUBLIC ENTITY/CITIZEN/ORGANIZATION/MEDIA, OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Generic Ltr 80-38 to all nonpower reactor licensees re NPR physical protection requirements.Summary of certain NPR physical protection requirements encl & should aid in determining safeguards requirements applicable to facility.
item.description: CORRESPONDENCE-LETTERS, GENERIC LETTERS, GENERIC LETTERS & IE LETTERS TO MULTIPLE PLANTS., OUTGOING CORRESPONDENCE
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF NUCLEAR REACTOR REGULATION (NRR)

item.title: Informs that NRC plans to administer generic fundamentals exam section of written operator licenseing exam on 970409. Ltr w/copy to Chief,Operator Licensing Branch must be submitted to listed address in order to register personnel.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION III)

item.title: Package of compilations of results of operator licensing & requalification exams.
item.description: ARCHIVE RECORDS, PACKAGE OF NONCODED MATERIAL
item.author: NRC

item.title: Responds to FOIA request for compilations of results of operator licensing & requalification exams.App A documents placed in PDR.App B documents already in PDR.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF ADMINISTRATION (ADM)
